output: html_document

```{r, echo = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(brms)
library(psych)

load(here("anlys_df.RData"))

df <- anlys_df %>%
  # Select and rename variables for analysis
  select(
    anxiety_identity = anxiety_identity_rev,
    symptom_severity = oa_sx_sev_m_std,
    behavioral_avoidance = avo,
    experiential_avoidance = comp_act_willing,
    anxiety_duration
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    # Reverse-code experiential avoidance such that higher values = more avoidance
    experiential_avoidance = 7 - experiential_avoidance,
    # Create symptom severity groups for plotting
    symptom_severity_group = cut(symptom_severity, c(-9, -1, 1, 9)),
    # Create ordered factor versions of DVs for regressions
    behavioral_avoidance_fct = factor(behavioral_avoidance, ordered = T),
    experiential_avoidance_fct = factor(experiential_avoidance, ordered = T)
  )
```

## Descriptive Statistis

```{r}
numeric_variables <- c(
  "anxiety_identity", 
  "behavioral_avoidance",
  "experiential_avoidance",
  "symptom_severity",
  "anxiety_duration"
)

# Histograms
for(x in numeric_variables) hist(df[[x]])

# Correlations
correlations <- df %>%
  select(all_of(numeric_variables)) %>%
  corr.test(use = "pairwise.complete.obs")

round(correlations$r, 2)
round(correlations$p, 3)
```

## Regressions

### Behavioral Avoidance

```{r}
model_ba <- brm(
  data = df, 
  formula = behavioral_avoidance_fct ~ mo(anxiety_identity), 
  family = cumulative("probit")
)
summary(model_ba)

model_ba_control <- brm(
  data = df, 
  formula = behavioral_avoidance_fct ~ mo(anxiety_identity) + symptom_severity,
  family = cumulative("probit")
)
summary(model_ba_control)

model_ba_severity_mod <- brm(
  data = df, 
  formula = behavioral_avoidance_fct ~ mo(anxiety_identity)*symptom_severity, 
  family = cumulative("probit")
)
summary(model_ba_severity_mod)

model_ba_duration_mod <- brm(
  data = df, 
  formula = behavioral_avoidance_fct ~ mo(anxiety_identity)*mo(anxiety_duration) + symptom_severity, 
  family = cumulative("probit")
)
summary(model_ba_duration_mod)
```

Figures.

```{r}
df %>%
  pivot_longer(c(behavioral_avoidance, experiential_avoidance)) %>%
  mutate(
    # Rename variables
    name = recode(
      name,
      "behavioral_avoidance" = "Behavioral Avoidance",
      "experiential_avoidance" = "Experiential Avoidance"
    ),
    # Remove points where no SE can be calculated
    value = case_when(
      name == "Behavioral Avoidance" & anxiety_identity == 0 & value == 0 ~ NA,
      name == "Behavioral Avoidance" & anxiety_identity == 1 & value == 4 ~ NA,
      name == "Experiential Avoidance" & anxiety_identity == 0 & value == 0 ~ NA,
      name == "Experiential Avoidance" & anxiety_identity == 1 & value == 6 ~ NA,
      T ~ value
    )
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(anxiety_identity, value, group = symptom_severity_group, color = symptom_severity_group)) +
  stat_summary(alpha = .25) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = "y ~ x", se = F) +
  facet_wrap(~ name, scales = "free") +
  scale_x_continuous(name = "Anxiety Identity") +
  scale_color_discrete(
    name = "Anxiety Symptom Severity",
    labels = c("Low (1 S.D. or More Below Mean)", "Medium (Within 1 S.D. of Mean)", "High (1 S.D. or More Above Mean)"),
    guide = guide_legend(reverse = T)
  ) +
  ggh4x::facetted_pos_scales(y = list(name == "Behavioral Avoidance" ~ scale_y_continuous(name = "Avoidance", limits = c(0, 4)),
                                      name == "Experiential Avoidance" ~ scale_y_continuous(name = "Avoidance", limits = c(0, 6)))) +
  theme_classic()

ggsave(filename = here("figures", "Avoidance by Identity.png"),
       width = 8,
       height = 4,
       units = "in")
```
